text:
倉持は口を噤んで下を向いた。 拗ねた顔がちょっとだけ赤い。 その変化を見逃してやる俺とスピッツではない。
「おっ、こりゃあいるぜ亮介！ いる反応だぞこれ！」
「ちょ、純さん！ いないですって！」
「いーやいる！ 俺の勘がそう言ってんだよ！ なあ！」
「わかりやすいね倉持。 顔に出るうちはまだまだだねえ」
trans:
Kuramochi clamped his mouth shut and looked down, his sulking face tinged with a slight redness. Neither I nor Spitz would ever miss such a reaction.
"Oh, we've got something here, Ryosuke! That's definitely a reaction!"
"Wait, Jun-san! There's nothing there!"
"Nope, there is! My gut's never wrong! Right?"
"You're so easy to read, Kuramochi. As long as it shows on your face, you've still got a long way to go."
